name: Stop or Go!
description:
This small game is one of the games they've played from my favourite variety show  called 'Running Man'. This game is entirely up to your luck and probability.

You have 8 total tries to decrease a value of 65000 to 0. The amount to potentially be reduced each try is between 1000-20000, and are hidden behind a number on the board. Stop the increasing number when you think the potential value behind the board number you have chosen is less than or equal. The number revealed is also removed from the potential number pool.

You win if you reach 0 on the remaining amount. You lose if the remaining amount is more than 0 and there are 0 tries left.

Rules/Instructions -

1. Choose a number from the board

2. Stop the value increasing

3. If the random number from the board you chose is lower or equal than the stopped value, it will decrease from the remaining amount. Otherwise you have wasted a try

4. Repeat until remaining amount is 0 or tries are depleted
